Hello, I am

Aubrey young

UI/UX Designer

Email me (aycodedesign@gmail.com) Peruse my résumé Connect on LinkedIn

...and I love taking things apart

As a seasoned IT Supervisor and Graphic Design professional, I thrive on crafting seamless experiences that resonate with users and drive impactful outcomes. Based in Burbank, my journey has been marked by a relentless pursuit of excellence and a passion for innovation. In addition to my role as an IT Supervisor at the United States Census Bureau, where I honed my skills in strategic project management and content planning, I've also had the privilege of serving as a Design Supervisor and Student Tutor at the Art Institute Of California.
